data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Victoria have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Aguascalientes.
In the minute 3, In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Necaxa.
Goal! Necaxa have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Ian Gonzalez.
In the minute 4, That's a fine assist from David Cabrera.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 7, Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 9, Tijuana de Caliente to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the away team a throw-in.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez waits before resuming play because Jair Pereira for Necaxa is still down.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It seems as if Jair Pereira is unable to continue. Mario De Luna replaces him for the home team.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Necaxa.
In the minute 16, Tijuana de Caliente's Fabian Castillo gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Victoria. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 17, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Necaxa just outside Tijuana de Caliente's area.
Necaxa's David Cabrera misses with an attempt on goal.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 23, It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Can Tijuana de Caliente capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Tijuana de Caliente's Jonathan Orozco gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Necaxa defender.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Necaxa a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Necaxa throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Necaxa.
Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the home team a throw-in.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 32, In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Necaxa.
Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 36, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Necaxa.
Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Necaxa.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Aguascalientes to check on Marcel Ruiz, who is grimacing with pain.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Necaxa.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Aguascalientes.
In the minute 45, Idekel Dominguez (Necaxa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The second-half has started.
Can Necaxa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
In the minute 47, Fernando Arce is replacing Claudio Baeza for the home team.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
In the minute 49, Necaxa to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
In the minute 52, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
Throw-in Necaxa.
Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Tijuana de Caliente have been given a penalty...
Bryan Angulo (Tijuana de Caliente) has missed a penalty!
Tijuana de Caliente's Marcel Ruiz is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 59, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in Necaxa's half.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
The away team replace Bryan Angulo with Luis Leal.
In the minute 61, Jordi Cortizo is on a sub for David Barbona for Tijuana de Caliente.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Necaxa needs to be cautious. Tijuana de Caliente have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 64, Edgar Lopez is on a sub for Marcel Ruiz for Tijuana de Caliente.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 65, Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio Victoria, Vladimir Lorona has been yellow-carded for the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 68, Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
Necaxa are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Jordan Rezabala is replacing Mauro Lainez for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 73, Tijuana de Caliente make their fourth substitution with Aldo Cruz replacing Vladimir Lorona.
In the minute 74, Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
The home team have replaced Juan Delgado with Maximiliano Salas. This is the third substitution made today by Jose Guadalupe Cruz Nunez.
Martin Barragan is replacing Lucas Passerini for the home team.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Necaxa throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
In the minute 77, Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 78, Tijuana de Caliente are in shooting range from this free kick.
Tijuana de Caliente will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Necaxa.
Jaime Gomez (Tijuana de Caliente) has received a yellow card from Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
In the minute 81, Goal! Fernando Arce extends Necaxa lead to 2-0 with a header.
Great play from David Cabrera to set up the goal.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 83, Jordi Cortizo (Tijuana de Caliente) gets a yellow card.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Necaxa to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Necaxa.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Necaxa.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Aguascalientes.
Maximiliano Salas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Necaxa.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
That's full-time at Estadio Victoria. The final score is 2-0.
Jose Guadalupe Cruz Nunez (Necaxa) is making a fifth substitution, with Alejandro Andrade replacing Ian Gonzalez.
Maximiliano Salas for Necaxa has been booked by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez and receives a first yellow card.
